attributes.action: Parliament to respond to petitions posted on Change.org
attributes.additional_details:
Jacob Rees-Mogg recently announced that parliament would only consider petitions from petition.parliament.uk, not from change.org.

We deserve to have our voices heard, no matter what platform or site this sits upon.
attributes.background: Parliament to respond to petitions on change.org with over 10,000 signatures and those with over 100,000 signature to be considered for debate.
